statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT barcode, item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE last_updated < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, item_name FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level < 5 ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC, item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level < 5 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT id, item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY stock_level DESC
SELECT barcode, item_name FROM inventory_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%shoes%' AND stock_level BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY barcode
SELECT id, item_name, last_updated FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level = 0 ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, item_name, barcode FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE barcode LIKE '%123%' AND quantity > 5;
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_updated FROM InventoryItems ORDER BY last_updated ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, item_name, barcode FROM InventoryItems WHERE barcode IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_updated FROM InventoryItems WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;

SELECT InventoryItems.item_name, StockRecords.transaction_type, StockRecords.quantity_change FROM InventoryItems LEFT JOIN StockRecords ON InventoryItems.id = StockRecords.inventory_item_id WHERE StockRecords.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM InventoryItems;
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems;
SELECT id, item_name, stock_quantity FROM InventoryItems;
SELECT scanned_barcode, scan_date FROM BarcodeScanningLogs ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT id, item_name, stock_quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems;
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT log_id, scan_date, scanned_by_user FROM BarcodeScanningLogs ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems WHERE item_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity, update_date FROM InventoryItems JOIN StockRecords ON InventoryItems.id = StockRecords.item_id ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_id, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_items WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT barcode FROM barcode_scans WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_description, log_date FROM inventory_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT item_name, log_description, log_date FROM inventory_items JOIN inventory_logs ON inventory_items.item_id = inventory_logs.item_id;
SELECT barcode, transaction_type, quantity_changed, transaction_date FROM stock_records WHERE transaction_type = 'IN';
SELECT barcode, scan_date FROM barcode_scans WHERE scan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Inventory_Items;
SELECT item_name, barcode_number FROM Inventory_Items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_description FROM Inventory_Items WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Stock_Records WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY date_added ASC;
SELECT event_id, scan_id, event_type FROM Scan_Events WHERE event_type = 'error';
SELECT * FROM Inventory_Items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM Inventory_Items WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT barcode_number, COUNT(*) AS total_scans FROM Barcode_Scans GROUP BY barcode_number HAVING total_scans > 5 ORDER BY total_scans DESC;
SELECT Users.username, Users.role, Stock_Records.quantity FROM Users JOIN Stock_Records ON Users.user_id = Stock_Records.item_id WHERE Stock_Records.quantity > 10;
SELECT event_time, event_type, event_description FROM Scan_Events WHERE event_type = 'error' ORDER BY event_time ASC;
